full_text: Lise | a ah BL 2014/KER/242 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR.JUSTICE HARUN-UL-RASHID THURSDAY, THE 2ND DAY OF JANUARY 2014/12TH POUSHA, 1935 Cril.MC.No. 81 of 2014 [L.P. NO.6/2012 OF THE SESSIONS COURT, THODUPUZHA, CRIME NO. 78/2007 OF CUMBUMMETTU POLICE STATION , IDUKKI DISTRICT] PETITIONER/ACCUSED NO.1: MURALEEKRISHNAN, S/O. THANKAPPAN PILLAI,AGED 29 YEARS, AMBIKA SADANATHIL HOUSE, MUKHATHALA VILLAGE, KOLLAM, PRESENT ADDRESS OF PETITIONER'S PARENTS: RAJENDRAPEL BUILDING , ILLICKAPADY, MARANA ROAD, EROOR, TRIPUNITHURA, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT. BY ADV. SRI.K.JAYAKUMAR(CHERTHALA). RESPONDENT/COMPLAINANT: STATE OF KERALA, THROUGH SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, CUMBUMMETTU REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT. SAREENA GEORGE. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 02-01-2014, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Prv. BIL ae at | eae 2014/KER/242 CRL.M.C. NO.81/2014: APPENDIX PETITIONER'S ANNEXURES: ANNEXURE-A1: TRUE COPY OF ORDER DATED 7.9.2009 IN B.A.NO.4962 OF 2009 OF THIS HON'BLE COURT. ANNEXURE-A2: TRUE COPY OF PASSPORT OF THE PETITIONER. RESPONDENTS ANNEXURES: NIL. HTRUE COPY// P.A. TO JUDGE. Prv. Bee 2014/KER/242 HARUN-UL-RASHID, J. CriLM.C. No.81 of 2014 Dated this the 2 day of January 2014. ORDER Heard the learned counsel for the _ petitioner and respondents. 2. Petitioner is the accused No.1 in Crime No. 78/2007 of Cumbummettu Police Station, Idukki District pending as L.P.No. 6/2012 on the file of the Sessions Court, Thoudpuzha. The petitioner is charge sheeted for the offence punishable under Sections 8 (1) and (2) of the Abkari Act and under Section 3 (1) of PDPP Act. Due to the non-appearance of the petitioner, non- bailable warrant was issued against him. 3. The petitioner is willing to surrender before the court below. Non-bailable warrant is pending against him. Now, the petitioner seeks a direction from this Court to consider his application for bail on the date of surrender itself. In the facts and circumstances, the Crl.M.C is disposed of, directing the Sessions Court, Thodupuzha to consider and pass orders on the bail application on the date of surrender itself in the event of the petitioner surrendering before the court below and Pipes cpiateat BIDRa 2014/KER/242 Crl.M.C. No.81/2004 :2: submitting an application for bail with prior notice to the Assistant Public Prosecutor within a period of fifteen days from today. The non-bailable warrant issued shall be kept in abeyance till the bail application is heard and dispose of. Sd/- HARUN-UL-RASHID, Judge. AL/- True copy P.A to Judge
